topic.title: It's time to fork ZeroNet
topic.body: Tamas "Nofish" Kocsis had not responded to my last email and did not return to ZeroNet development over this past summer. We can no longer rely on him to further develop ZeroNet.

1631986324_1BxrMQR2odvohNyH3mgZo1z9fkj4q.body:
You may copy the code from Syncronite if you wish. I got the JavaScript from StackOverflow, so it's fair game, and if I had to license it, it would be MIT.

In fact, I might do what you're doing with the v3 trackers, what I'm doing with ngosang's trackers list, to simplify the process for users.
Are you using a script or are you adding these trackers manually?
The first tracker on your list does not work. Please remove it.

1632037357_1BxrMQR2odvohNyH3mgZo1z9fkj4q.body: It's even easier with Android. This should be a no-brainer.

1632313931_1E22iXWCkyfdJiBmkP3XEuAK9hp7u.body:
It's just a distributed web. There's no blockchain nor coin to mine.

Your certificates are stored in data/users.json

1632333142_1MieUGUUVUxVmvuLNGcTXt9wVBSqp.body: Posts don't show on that site. Share the text here.

1632343427_1NceP4NFjHrUbHM7dLUxyLtXbTCrg.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_1558_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Thanks Captain Obvious. Go ahead, fork and hope you don't abandon it within a month.

Nothing wrong with a recap to enlighten the newbs.

1632517987_1KuwwnkAtVrfnyhv8pyGRxLqzNZbE.body: Now you just need to work on the UI of the site.
